title: This six-wheeled Suzuki Jimny is possibly the greatest thing we’ve ever seen
description: Back in 2013, Mercedes unveiled the G63 AMG 6x6. Since then, many have tried to replicate the original six-wheeled G’s presence by jacking up the ride height of their SUV or truck and whacking another axle underneath. None of those creations have been able to conjure up the excitement we felt when we first saw the bonkers G63... until now. You see, this is a custom-built Suzuki Jimny 6x6. Although actually, the new rear wheels are just for show so it’s technically a Jimny 6x4. Still extremely cool.

title: Manila Auto Salon Sport and Truck Show
description:
Block your schedules this weekend.

Catch our unique and world class builds at Manila Auto Salon Sport and Truck Show 2022 at SMX Convention Center. Visit our cubicle with Profender x Ridemax Philippines, Fuel Offroad PH, BFGoodrich Tires - Team Ridemax Philippines and witness for yourself what we have been cooking since for this year’s event. Discount and promos await you there.

title: Autobot Offroad World Class in the Philippine craftsmanship in Qatar
description:
Nothing is impossible when you put your heart and work hard for it. By God’s grace and His will, all will fall into place.

It is a great honor to bring pride in the Philippine craftsmanship in Qatar. Our very own and very first in the automotive industry. We don’t only represent one shop, but we represent one nation.

Our sincerest gratitude to To Her Excellency Lillibeth V. Pono, His Excellency Sheikh Ahmad bin Nawaf Al Thani, to the Suhail group, to Mr. Ziad Eissa Aboukloub, to Mr. Malik Abu Al Wafa, to Mr. Akshith Shitte, and to all members of management who remain dedicated to Autobot Qatar.

We are here not to compete, but to bring the Autobot Offroad World Class Quality Build and leave our mark in the world. What we have will be our edge from others. What we planted will make us known. We are excited to witness this endeavor unfold.

To all who came to witness our event, to our fellow kababayans and friends who were there. Thank you for your support. You are and will always be part of our journey.

Disclaimer: Autobot Offroad is not affiliated with any of the brands herein posted nor do we intend to infringe on any copyrights. Photos featured are owned by the Autobot Offroad for reference use only.

title: This six-wheeled Suzuki Jimny is possibly the greatest thing we’ve ever seen

Since then, many have tried to replicate the original six-wheeled G’s presence by jacking up the ride height of their SUV or truck and whacking another axle underneath. title: Autobot Jambore 2023
description:
The weather may have different plans for us but we still weathered our way to experience this event on a whole new scenario. Just like in life, events can change in an instant, it is compeletely up to us how we will look it and take it on a positive perspective.

From long drive to muddy road, Autobot Jamboree 2023 brought out the resilience, perseverance, and true camaraderie amongst us. Not only that, our Autobot built rig was put on true test of quality build and boy oh boy, they all did not disappoint.

Our biggest gratitude to all our clients. Autobot Jamboree 2023 is all about you. Its success wouldn’t be possible if we did not graced it all together. You may opt to choose a different direction because of the weather but we saw how steadfast you are the entire time we were there.

Our big shoutout to our major partners for this event. Thank you BFGoodrich, Team Ridemax Philippines, and Bosch for the support since the start of our planning.

To the suppliers who continue to support us, we cannot express our gratitude well enough. Our client’s happiness is our success.

To our organizing team and our Agno family who helped us make sure that the place will be ready, what a job well done. It may not be what we hoped for, but it turned out to be better.

And to our Almighty God, thank you for protecting us and covering us from the storm. It may have been worst but You showed Your miracle by letting the sun shine most of the day.

And to our Almighty God, thank you for protecting us and covering us from the storm. It may have been worst but You showed Your miracle by letting the sun shine most of the day.

#AutobotSTRONG
#FueledbyGOD
#AutobotExperience
#AutobotJambore2023
#AutobotOffroad
#Blessed
#QualityBuild
#SmallDetailsMatter
#AutobotAllDay

title: The new Ford Ranger Raptor gets a proper twin-turbo V6 engine
description: When Ford launched the first Ranger Raptor pick-up a few years ago, we loved everything about it. Well, almost everything. The one component that didn’t seem to fit with the Baja-bashing nature was the 210bhp 2.0-litre diesel engine. Sure, it had 369lb ft of torque and we were never expecting an F-150 Raptor-syle V8, but it lacked soul and drama.  Luckily it seems Ford Performance was listening, because the new Raptor (based on the next generation Ranger unveiled late last year) will have a twin-turbo 3.0-litre EcoBoost V6 at its heart. Hurrah!
